articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Foreign Party and State Leaders
 Pyongyang. October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to party and state leaders of different countries in reply to their messages of greeting and congratulatory letters on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK. 
					 They included the first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission of China, the premier of the State Council of China, the chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, the president of Nepal, the president of Laos who doubles as general secretary of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the presidents of Myanmar and Mongolia, the king of Bahrain, the president of Bangladesh, the sultan and head of state of Brunei Darussalam, the presidents of Syria and Sri Lanka, the king of Cambodia, the emir of Kuwait, the king of Thailand, the president of Pakistan, the president of Palestine who doubles as chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestinian Liberati
					
					 on Organization, the emir and the vice emir of Qatar, the president of Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Armenia and Azerbaijan, the sultan of Oman, the presidents of Iran, Indonesia, India, Greece, Belarus, Croatia and Portugal, the captains regent of San Marino, the king of Spain, the presidents of Guinea, Namibia and South Sudan, the prime minister of Lesotho, the king of Morocco, the presidents of Mali, Mauritania, Burundi, Senegal, Zambia, Equatorial Guinea, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Tanzania, Cameroon, Congo, DR Congo, Tunisia, Algeria, Angola, Uganda, Eritrea, Egypt and Ethiopia.
					
					 He also sent reply messages to the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and the UN secretary general.
					
					 He in the reply messages expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and relevant countries would steadily grow stronger and wished them successes in their works.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Urges U.S. to Respond to Its Proposal for Signing Peace Treaty
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Urges U.S. to Respond to Its Proposal for Signing Peace Treaty
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement on Wednesday:
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK to remove the danger of a war, defuse tension and create a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Out of its desire to put the earliest possible end to the fragile state of ceasefire that has persisted on the peninsula and build lasting peace-keeping mechanism, the DPRK re-clarified its stand to replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty at the 70th UN General Assembly.
					
					 More than 60 years have passed since the conclusion of the AA but durable peace has not yet settled on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea have staged ceaseless military exercises, big or small, under various codenames in and around the peninsula, increasing the danger of an unpredictable situation to be created by an accidental case.
					
					 The lesson taught by the August incident in which the situation reached the brink of a war in a moment due to a minor incident for unknown reason proves that it would be impossible to preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula any longer with the present AA that exists in its name only.
					
					 The evil cycle of escalation of tension will repeat itself and the situation leading to the brink of a war will be unavoidable as long as the state of armistice persists on the peninsula.
					
					 No one can vouch that an all-out war would not break out on the peninsula and in that case that will quickly spill over into a world war.
					
					 A fundamental way of putting this serious situation under control is for the DPRK and the U.S. to scrap the outdated AA and sign a new peace treaty as early as possible to build durable peace-keeping mechanism on the peninsula.
					
					 Since the conclusion of the AA we have made fair and aboveboard and realistic proposals and initiatives to replace the AA by a peace treaty and have made strenuous and sincere efforts to put them into practice.
					
					 The U.S. has to part with its anachronistic policy aimed to keep the armistice system and respond to the DPRK's just proposal for signing a peace treaty.
					
					 In fact, it is the U.S. which holds OPECON of the south Korean army and it is also the U.S. which manages the AA.
					
					 If the U.S. boldly makes a policy switchover, we have the willingness to respond to constructive dialogue and then security environment on the peninsula will witness dramatic improvement and this will help the U.S. clear its security concerns.
					
					 We have already sent through an official channel a message urging the U.S. side to respond to the proposal for signing a peace treaty with sincerity.
					
					 We hope that the U.S. will prudently study our proposal for the peace treaty and affirmatively respond to it.

articles.title: Coins to Be Minted in DPRK to Mark WPK's 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Coins to Be Minted in DPRK to Mark WPK's 70th Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Commemorative coins "70th Founding Anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea" will be minted in the DPRK.
					 The coins will be minted in gold and silver. 
					
					 The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated a decree in this regard on September 23. 
					
					 Seen in the centre of the fronts of the gold and silver coins is the emblem of the WPK, the flag of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union" and Mt. Paektu. Inscribed on both sides are letters "1945" and "2015." There are letters reading "Long Live the Glorious WPK" in the upper part and the letters "70th Anniversary" in the center of laurel tree in the lower parts which are decorated with 70 marks. 
					
					 Inscribed in relief in the centre of their back sides is the emblem of the DPRK. Seen in the upper parts of the coins are words "The Central Bank of the DPRK" and in their lower parts degree of purity, weight and the year of their minting. 
					
					 The size of the pure gold commemorative coin is 35 mm in diameter and 2 mm in thickness and that of pure silver commemorative coin 40 mm in diameter and 3 mm in thickness.

articles.title: Cambodian Party Leader Praises WPK's Policies and Lines
articles.content:
Cambodian Party Leader Praises WPK's Policies and Lines
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Hong Ki Chol, DPRK ambassador to Cambodia, paid a courtesy call on Norodom Ranariddh, chairman of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia, on September 29. 
					 The chairman said the relations between Cambodia and the DPRK are the historical and special relations of friendship forged by Great King Norodom Sihanouk and great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung rendered material and moral assistance to Norodom Sihanouk when he was suffering the most stern ordeals, the chairman said, adding:
					
					 Not only the Cambodian people but also all the world know well about this. 
					
					 It is our duty and obligation to steadily develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people as desired by the great leaders. 
					
					 The Funcinpec Party fully supports the policies and lines of the WPK headed by respected H.E. Marshal Kim Jong Un and wishes the Korean people bigger success in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Agreement on Cooperation between Associations of DPRK, Poland Signed
articles.content:
Agreement on Cooperation between Associations of DPRK, Poland Signed
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation between the DPRK-Poland Friendship Association and the Poland-Korea Association was signed here Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Vice-Chairman Ryu Kyong Il and members of the DPRK-Poland Friendship Association and from the Polish side Jacech Poniewierski, first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, and a staff member of the Polish embassy here.
					
					 Ryu Kyong Il and Jacech Poniewierski inked the agreement.

articles.title: DPRK Table-Tennis Players Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Table-Tennis Players Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK players returned home Wednesday after taking part in the 22nd Asian Table-Tennis Championships.

articles.title: Overseas Compatriots Arrive
articles.content:
Overseas Compatriots Arrive
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Overseas compatriots arrived here Wednesday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. led by Chairman Yun Kil Sang, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Canada led by Chairman Kim Su Hae, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia led by Secretary General Im Tae Gyu, a delegation of officials of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong, a group for supporting the association led by Director Kim Yon Ju and Ri Ji Suk, chairperson of the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Here
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of General Association of Koreans in China Here
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Chairwoman Choe Un Bok arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Family Members of Persons Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
articles.content:
Family Members of Persons Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Family members of the persons related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle arrived here to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included family members of the Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, Wang Minggui, Jie Qing, Jiang Zihua and Liu Tongshi, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family members of Pak Kil Song, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr in China, family members of Kim Sun Ok, Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China.
					
					 Arriving here on the same day were family members of Liu Hanxing and Peng Xilu, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and family members of So Sun Ok, Korean anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter in China.

articles.title: Russian Academy Ensemble Here
articles.content:
Russian Academy Ensemble Here
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior led by Viktor Yeliseev arrived here Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Zimbabwean President Sends Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Zimbabwean President Sends Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe and president and first secretary of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Wednesday.
					
					 A floral basket from the Switzerland-Korea Committee was placed before the statues on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps Here
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches Corps Here
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were handed over to an official concerned Wednesday by Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, on behalf of the corps.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations, Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets from Foreign Organizations, Figures
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from foreign organizations and figures on Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included the Miyagi Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, Shigoku Liaison Society for Japan-Korea Friendship, Japanese Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Hiroshima Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, Jindallae Saphariny, president of the Jindallae Children's Foundation, and Shunichi Narita, media man of Japan.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party and members of the WHO mission here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The guests laid floral baskets before their statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Baskets and Gifts to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets and Gifts to Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and his party on a visit to the DPRK to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and a floral basket and gift from a delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					 He also received a gift from the IIJI secretary general.
					
					 The floral baskets and gifts were separately handed to an official concerned Wednesday.

articles.title: Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Palestinian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at his embassy on Wednesday to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and officials concerned. 
					
					 The ambassador said in his speech that the WPK ushered in an era of glory and prosperity for building a thriving socialist nation of Juche under the experienced and tested leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, eternal leaders of the Korean people. 
					
					 He expressed the firm belief that the WPK would steadily advance toward the noble goal of building a thriving nation and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam said the undying revolutionary exploits performed by the great leaders by founding and developing the WPK are now firmly preserved and shining more brilliantly thanks to the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK. 
					
					 He added that the Korean people would as ever extend invariable support and solidarity to the just cause of the Palestinian people to regain the legitimate national rights including the building of an independent state with East Kuds as its capital city.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Monument to Party Founding
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Monument to Party Founding
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here visited the Monument to Party Founding Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The guests looked round the monument, being briefed on the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the cause of building a Juche-based revolutionary party and the invincible might of the WPK winning victory and glory only under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The corps also toured the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition on the same day.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Show Opens
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Show Opens
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A Korean stamp show "70 years of victory and glory" was opened with due ceremony at the Korean Stamp Exhibition Hall on Wednesday in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed in the hall was a photo of a stamp carrying the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were stamps dealing with the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un for party-building, the lines and policies laid down by the WPK in every period and at every stage of the developing revolution for the past seven decades and the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their struggle to carry them out.
					
					 Also displayed there were varieties of stamps presented by philatelists in Pyongyang.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Kwang Chol, minister of Posts and Telecommunications, officials concerned, creators, philatelists and other working people.
					
					 Present there were foreign diplomatic envoys, officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Ho Song Gil, director of the State Stamp Bureau, made an opening ceremony.
					
					 The participants looked round the stamps on display.

articles.title: Grand Chorus Performance Given
articles.content:
Grand Chorus Performance Given
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A grand chorus performance "We will cover one road forever, following our great party" was given by members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as chorus "Glory to Our Great Party" and "We Sing of the Party", solo and chorus "Thank You, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by pioneering the cause of building the Juche-based revolutionary party and wisely leading it and providing eternal foundation for successful advance of the Korean revolution and prosperity of Songun Korea.
					
					 They impressively represented the appearance of the Korean women leading a worthwhile life as proud women revolutionaries under the loving care of the peerlessly great men.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Hamhung, October 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Hungnam Port Wednesday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The captain and crewmen of the Cambodia-flagged ship Wenqiao were present at the meeting.
					
					 Speakers said that the WPK is shedding its rays as the most dignified and authoritative party in the world thanks to the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They noted that the WPK has developed into the party of the leader under the leadership of the peerlessly great persons, adding that it is only the DPRK which achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses.
					
					 They expressed belief that immensely bright and rosy is the future of the Korean people led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: New Branch School Appears at Foot of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
New Branch School Appears at Foot of Mt. Paektu
 Samjiyon, October 7 (KCNA) -- A new branch school was set up for 8 students in Rimyongsu workers' district of Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province.
					 The Sobaek branch of Chongbong Senior Secondary School has a class room fully equipped with various school things, a playground and other educational conditions and environment.
					
					 Teachers are educating the students there.

articles.title: Immortal Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il in Building Model Party
articles.content:
Immortal Feats Performed by Kim Jong Il in Building Model Party
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The high dignity and invincible might of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and brilliant successes achieved by it would have been unthinkable without unremitting efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime to strengthen the WPK into a revolutionary party.
					 He clarified the philosophical principle that the revolutionary party is, in its essence, the party of its leader, a political organization that materializes the leader's idea and leadership.
					
					 Through the energetic ideological and theoretical activities, he formulated President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as Kimilsungism, the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea, and thus provided a firm guarantee for strengthening the WPK into the party of the President.
					
					 In the period of the Arduous March, the forced march when the country was in hard time, Kim Jong Il gave fullest play to the role of the WPK as the organizer and leader of all victories of the Korean people and wisely led the struggle for defending socialism to victory.
					
					 Highly conscious of his responsibility for accomplishing the global independence, he wrote many celebrated works like "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party", "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" and "Socialism Is a Science", so as to clearly indicate the way out for the ruling parties in socialist countries.
					
					 The publication of his famous work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" evoked a great sensation in over 100 countries.
					
					 Seminars, lectures and workshops on his works took place on a worldwide scale. And the progressive parties across the world put forward him as their honorary chairman.
					
					 Thanks to his outstanding ideology and seasoned leadership, the WPK could be developed into a model party while demonstrating its prestige and dignity the world over.
					
					 The undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in party building is being creditably carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Emblem of WPK Associated with Efforts of Great Leader
articles.content:
Emblem of WPK Associated with Efforts of Great Leader
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A three-person group sculpture representing worker, peasant and intellectual stands in front of the Tower of the Juche Idea on the bank of the Taedong River flowing through Pyongyang, the capital city of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 Hammer, sickle and brush, held by each person of the sculpture in their hands, symbolize the emblem of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Seeing the sculpture, the Korean people now recall the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung to institute the WPK emblem.
					
					 When a work was going on to design the emblem of the WPK, Kim Il Sung suggested that it should be designed in such a way as to show the WPK is a unified party of the working masses.
					
					 And examining its draft design, he set the order of hammer, sickle and brush, personally drawing a design of the WPK emblem.
					
					 Under his energetic and meticulous guidance, the peculiar emblem of the WPK came into being, vividly representing the character and noble mission of the Party.

articles.title: Papers Assail S. Korean Vessel's Piracy
articles.content:
Papers Assail S. Korean Vessel's Piracy
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA)-- A south Korean vessel deliberately slammed into the DPRK's fishing boat Turubong-3 in the East Sea of Korea on Oct. 1 before taking to flight.
					 Leading newspapers here Wednesday carry commentaries in this regard.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says in the light of the overall course of the incident, the south Korean vessel deliberately rammed into the DPRK's boat. This can be evidenced by the fact that the surrounding was very bright and the DPRK boat suffered a serious damage and the south Korean vessel made a hasty getaway.
					
					 If the south Korean vessel had collided with the DPRK's boat by mistake, it should have rendered necessary help to the crew of the DPRK side who sustained damage in the light of requirement of international law and morality and etiquette in the sea, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 In the past when south Korean fishermen drifted about at the mercy of rough storm in sea, we rescued them, repaired their damaged ships with sincerity and sent them back even with sufficient food loaded on their ships. This was prompted by noble humanitarianism and compatriotism.
					
					 The recent case clearly proves the nature of "humanitarianism" touted by the south Korean authorities.
					
					 What should be taken seriously is that the recent case happened at a time when the south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK provocation has reached its height, prompted by their design to chill the atmosphere of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean ship's reckless act was a deliberate provocation orchestrated by the south Korean authorities to render the north-south relations tense and realize their sinister aim.
					
					 Minju Joson also urges the south Korean authorities to make an apology and compensation to the DPRK for their recent crime if they have even an iota of willingness to improve the north-south relations, and severely punish those involved in the case.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Military Racket to Incite North-South Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Military Racket to Incite North-South Confrontation
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- It was reported that the United States set about reorganizing the system of quick reaction force in the Asia-Pacific region. According to it, 15 percent of the U.S. marines will be forward-deployed in Guam and Hawaii.
					 Huge aggressor forces including the U.S. nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan and a formation of F-22 Raptor are expected to be deployed in south Korea this month.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a commentary in this regard: Whenever there is a sign of improving the inter-Korean relations, the U.S. paid lip-service to "support" for it but, in actuality, deliberately fanned up the confrontation between the north and the south and escalated the tension.
					
					 It is the U.S. calculation that the escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula would help justify its arms buildup and put the whole of the peninsula under its control and realize its old hegemonic ambition by igniting a new war.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to complete its siege to big powers in the Asia-Pacific region and attain its military purpose by rapidly hurling its forces into the region any time it deems necessary.
					
					 This is the reason why the U.S. is reorganizing its forces in the direction of massively beefing up them in the Asia-Pacific region while cutting down its forces in EU and Mideast regions. 
					
					 The U.S. is introducing its marines, nuclear carrier task force and other huge aggressor forces into the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity while talking about the baseless "threat" from the DPRK. Its final purpose is to launch a war against the DPRK once an opportunity presents itself and put the DPRK under its control by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. ever more desperate efforts to mount a preemptive attack upon the DPRK would only harden its will to bolster up its war deterrence in every way.

articles.title: Peace and Improved North-South Relations Called for
articles.content:
Peace and Improved North-South Relations Called for
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Ri Chang Bok, permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, in a press interview on Oct. 4 called for concluding a peace treaty and settling the issue of north-south relations, according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 8 years have passed since the historic October 4 declaration was published, he said, and went on:
					
					 Had the south Korean authorities implemented the declaration, the south-north relations would have been improved and the atmosphere of peace created.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have still deteriorated the south-north relations by denying the declaration.
					
					 In order to achieve peace on the Korean Peninsula, it is necessary to abrogate the armistice agreement and conclude a peace treaty.
					
					 Only then, peace can be ensured institutionally, south-north relations be improved and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country be hastened.

articles.title: Commemorative Faberge Medal to Kim Jong Un from Russian Academy
articles.content:
Commemorative Faberge Medal to Kim Jong Un from Russian Academy
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with the commemorative Faberge medal and its certificate by the Russian National Philatelists Academy on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The academy decided to award the medal, the highest commendation of the academy, and its certificate to Kim Jong Un for his great contributions to boosting the friendly relations and cultural exchange between the DPRK and Russia. 
					
					 Sergei Tkachenko, chairman of the council for supporting the academy, handed over the medal and certificate to an official concerned on Wednesday. He is on a visit to the DPRK to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was published in booklet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan. 
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with leader Kim Jong Il's exploits of Songun revolution, the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of Songun revolution. 
					
					 The book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on October 1.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in booklet by the N.K. Publishing House in Enugu, Nigeria.
					 The work published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990) deals with the idea that the leadership of the party is the decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and clarifies the matter of strengthening the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and the basic way of performing the mission and duty of the party as the political body of the leadership.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Oct. 1.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Indonesian Political Party
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Indonesian Political Party
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- The National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia issued a statement on Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The WPK has been strengthened into the most dignified and powerful political force absolutely supported and trusted by broad masses while covering the road of the protracted and arduous struggle under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, and leader Kim Jong Il, its eternal general secretary.
					
					 The Korean people are following the WPK, calling it mother as it sets forth all its lines and policies while always prioritizing the people's interests and leads them to victory and glory only.
					
					 Fresh miracles and innovations are being brought about day after day in the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We sincerely wish the Korean people led by the WPK bigger victory in their struggle.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Russia
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- A seminar and lecture were held by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, round-table talks and film show by the Maritime Territorial Branch of the United Russia Party and an opening ceremony of a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition at the Far Eastern Fine Arts Museum on Sept. 30 and Oct. 1 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books and photos introducing the history of the ever-victorious WPK and handicraft works associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Attending there were personages of all social standings and masses of relevant regions. Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk.
					
					 The secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il founded the WPK and developed it into the invincible revolutionary party winning only victories and the mother party which the people follow, entrusting their destiny to it. 
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation noted that the WPK has developed into an invincible party as it is holding Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Regional Political Council of the United Russia Party hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and thus significantly adorn the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania, the Czech Republic, France and Indonesia from September 30 to October 2 with the approach of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, said President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK, a revolutionary party of broad masses guided by the Juche idea, the first of its kind in history, and provided a firm guarantee for the victorious advance of the socialist cause. 
					
					 Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, said the President founded the WPK right after the liberation of Korea on the basis of the organizational and ideological foundation for founding the party laid during the anti-Japanese armed struggle. 
					
					 Benoit Quennedey, international secretary of the Radical Party of Left of France, said the WPK created a new history of the struggle for carrying out the popular masses' cause of independence and socialism under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The director of the Adita Ariya Prawira Shipping Company of Indonesia said the WPK is the only party in the world which wins absolute support and trust from the people.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC demanda a EE.UU. responder a propuesta justa de RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC demanda a EE.UU. responder a propuesta justa de RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 7 siguiente declaracion:
					La RPDC tiene la invariable posicion de eliminar el peligro de guerra, aliviar la tension y preparar el ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					A partir del anhelo de poner fin cuanto antes al inquietante estado de armisticio, que perdura en la Peninsula Coreana, y establecer el sistema permanente de aseguramiento de paz, la RPDC volvio a aclarar en la 70a reunion de la Asamblea General de la ONU la posicion de sustituir de manera urgente el acuerdo de armisticio por el convenio de paz.
					
					Aunque pasaron 60 anos desde la firma del acuerdo de armisticio, no se logra todavia una paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea libran sin cesar los ejercicios militares de diversos nombres y envergaduras en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, debido a lo cual se agranda de dia a dia la peligrosidad de que un accidente casual puede acarrear una consecuencia inimaginable.
					
					El acontecimiento ocurrido en agosto en que un pequeno incidente, cuya causa no fue aclarada, llevo en un momento la situacion al borde del combate, dejo las lecciones de que el actual acuerdo de armisticio no puede asegurar mas la paz en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Mientras que perdura el estado de armisticio en esta peninsula, es inevitable que sigue el circulo vicioso de la agravacion de tension y se llega la situacion al borde de la guerra.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que no estallaria la guerra total en la Peninsula Coreana y en este caso, este conflicto se pasara facilmente a la contienda mundial.
					
					El remedio fundamental para prevenirlo es que la RPDC y EE.UU. anulen lo mas pronto posible el viejo Acuerdo de Armisticio y establezcan el sistema de paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana mediante la concertacion del nuevo convenio de paz. 
					
					Despues de la firma del Acuerdo de Armisticio hasta la fecha presentamos las propuestas e iniciativas justas y realistas para sustituirlo por el convenio de paz y hemos hecho sinceros y constantes esfuerzos por realizarlo. 
					
					EE.UU. debe abandonar la anacronica politica de mantener el sistema de armisticio y aceptar sin demora nuestra justa propuesta de concertar el convenio de paz.
					
					En efecto, EE.UU. tiene el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra del ejercito surcoreano y controla el Acuerdo de Armisticio.
					
					Si EE.UU. cambia con audacia su politica, tenemos la voluntad de hacer el dialogo constructivo. En este caso el ambiente de seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana acogera el mejoramiento dramatico y se eliminaran las preocupaciones de EE.UU. por la seguridad. 
					
					Ya  enviamos por via oficial a EE.UU. un mensaje urgiendole a aceptar con sinceridad la propuesta de concertar el convenio de paz.
					
					Esperamos que EE.UU. estudie con seriedad nuestra propuesta sobre la concertacion del convenio de paz y la acepte positivamente.

articles.title: Levantadas en Haeju estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Levantadas en Haeju estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- Fueron levantadas en la ciudad de Haeju las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Tuvo lugar este miercoles la ceremonia solemne de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros funcionarios de ramas interesadas, los benemeritos laborales, los miembros de la brigada de choque, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur. 
					
					El descubrimiento de las estatuas lo hicieron los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito y los funcionarios responsables de la susodicha provincia. 
					
					Al pie de las estatuas fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Tambien fueron puestos un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y el otro a nombre de los habitantes de la provincia.
					
					Luego, fueron depositados los cestos de flores a nombre de los organos del partido y el Poder, las entidades de masas, las instituciones, empresas, fabricas, granjas y universidades de la provincia arriba citada, las unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, etc. 
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes Lideres ante sus estatuas.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la APS de la RPDC.
					
					El orador dijo que la construccion de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres coreanos en la ciudad de Haeju deviene un acontecimiento de gran significacion en glorificar la vida y las hazanas revolucionarias de ellos, y una gran gloria y felicidad de los habitantes de la provincia. 
					
					Anadio que en todos los rincones de la provincia estan impregnados la destacada y probada orientacion y el ardiente amor al pueblo del Presidente y el Dirigente. 
					
					Prosiguio que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un dispenso gran benevolencia de levantar en la ciudad de Haeju las estatuas de bronce del Presidente y el Dirigente en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre las estatuas de bronce, los participantes las recorrieron.

articles.title: Emitida moneda acunada dedicada a aniversario 70 de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Emitida moneda acunada dedicada a aniversario 70 de fundacion del PTC
Pyongyang, 7 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio emitir en oro y plata la moneda acunada conmemorativa "70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea" para conmemorar  significativamente esta efemeride y publico el dia 23 un decreto correspondiente. 
					 En la cara de la moneda de oro y plata estan inscritas, en el centro, la insignia del PTC y la bandera de la "UDI (Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo)" y el monte Paektu y en ambos lados, las letras "1945" y "2015", en la parte superior, las letras "Viva el glorioso Parido del Trabajo de Corea", en la inferior, las letras "70o aniversario" en el centro de laurel y en el borde, 70 puntos.
					
					  En el reverso de la moneda de oro y plata se ven en su centro el escudo nacional de la RPDC, en la parte superior, las letras "Banco Central de la RPDC" y en la parte inferior, la pureza, el peso y el ano de emision.
					
					  La norma de la moneda de oro puro tiene 35mm de diametro y 2mm de grosor.
					
					  La norma de la moneda de plata pura tiene 40mm de diametro y 3mm de grosor.
